content: This group is loaded from LDAP. If you need to rename it, add or remove users, refer to the LDAP directory.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that provides information about groups loaded from LDAP directories. It appears in a UI component to inform users about the group's origin and provide instructions on how to manage it if necessary.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "If you need to rename it" is not accurately reflected in the Azerbaijani translation. "İstifadəçilərin adını dəyişmək" translates to "To change the names of users," which is not the same as changing the group's name itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu qrup LDAP-dan yüklənib. Qrupun adını dəyişmək, istifadəçiləri əlavə etmək və ya silmək lazımdırsa, LDAP kataloqunu yoxlayın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English "refer to the LDAP directory" is translated as "LDAP kataloqunu yoxlayın" which translates to "check the LDAP directory". While not entirely wrong, 'refer to' implies a reference guide or documentation, while 'check' is more basic. A more nuanced translation could improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu qrup LDAP-dan yüklənib. İstifadəçilərin adını dəyişmək, əlavə etmək və ya silmək lazımdırsa, LDAP kataloqundakı təlimatları oxuyun.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The pronoun 'го' (go) in 'да го преименувате' is ambiguous and doesn't clearly refer to 'групата' (the group). It should be changed to 'я' to correctly refer to a feminine noun.
The phrase 'sehen Sie im LDAP-Verzeichnis nach' is a bit awkward. A more natural translation for 'refer to' in this context would be 'wenden Sie sich an' or 'prüfen Sie'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Diese Gruppe wird aus LDAP geladen. Wenn Sie sie umbenennen, Benutzer hinzufügen oder entfernen müssen, wenden Sie sich an das LDAP-Verzeichnis.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'գրացուցակին' (gratsutsakin) is a less common and slightly awkward way to refer to a directory. While not strictly incorrect, 'ցուցակ' (tsutsak) or 'թղթակազմ ցուցակ' (paper directory) would be more natural.
The word 'ເອົາ' in 'ເພີ່ມຫຼືເອົາຜູ້ໃຊ້ອອກ' is slightly awkward. It literally means 'take out' and while understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing for removing users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເພີ່ມຫຼືລົບຜູ້ໃຊ້ອອກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure 'ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການປ່ຽນຊື່ມັນ' is a bit clunky. It could be more elegantly phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການປ່ຽນຊື່ກຸ່ມນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "odwołać się" is awkward and not the most natural way to express "refer to."  A more direct translation of 'refer to' would be 'sprawdzić' or 'odnieść się do'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dana grupa jest ładowana z LDAP. Aby zmienić jej nazwę, dodać lub usunąć użytkowników, należy sprawdzić katalog LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The pronoun 'его' (its) refers to 'группа' (group), but should agree in gender. 'Группа' is feminine, so the pronoun should be 'её'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Эта группа загружается из LDAP. Если вам нужно переименовать её, добавить или удалить пользователей, обратитесь к каталогу LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "පරිශීලකයින් එක කිරීමට" is not the most natural way to say 'add users'. A more natural phrasing would be "පරිශීලකයින් යෙදවීමට" or "පරිශීලකයින් ඇතුළත් කිරීමට".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින් යෙදවීමට or පරිශීලකයින් ඇතුළත් කිරීමට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'නාමාවලිය' translates more accurately to 'directory' or 'list' rather than 'directory list'. It's a bit redundant.
The term 'priečinok' (folder) is not the best translation for 'directory' in this context. 'Adresár' or 'zoznam' would be more appropriate for an LDAP directory.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Táto skupina je nahraná z LDAP. Ak ju potrebujete premenovať, pridať alebo odstrániť používateľov, obráťte sa na adresár LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "odpri imenik LDAP" (open LDAP directory) is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'refer to the LDAP directory'. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'poskrbite do LDAP imenika' or 'glejte v LDAP imenik'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ta skupina je naložena iz LDAP. Za preimenovanje, dodajanje ali odstranitev uporabnikov glejte v LDAP imenik.
